author: Vikash Kumar, Anna Fensel, Slobodanka Tomic, Goran Lazendic

resources.description: The SmartBuilding Ontology used in SESAME-S project. More details on http://sesame-s.ftw.at/
resources.name: 2012-08-20/SmartBuilding.owl

organization.description:
A collection of data about country level energy demand and energy generation technologies to the meet the demand with details of:

- land area required for different energy generation sources
- monetary cost of energy source to develop, implement, maintain and decommission, either by government or industry
- location or suitable location
- energy cost to make and maintain and decommission
- time to develop
- efficiency in cost/unit of energy 
- how efficiency is predicted to change over time
organization.title: Energy Data
organization.name: energy-data

name: smartbuilding-sesames
notes: This is the SmartBuilding Ontology created for SESAME-S project catering to the use case of a school building located at Kirchdorf, Austria. It caters to the limited number of concepts relating to the installed devices and sensors in the school and can be scaled to increase more complex buildings.
title: Smart Building Ontology SESAME-S
